description.raw:
This is Ian's branch, but I'm creating the pull request to move discussion away from pull request #573.

This branch has been tested on Jenkins:

Builds with all tests passing:

[drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-vrc 17](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-sl-vrc/17/)

[drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-tesla 8](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-sl-tesla/8/)

[drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-tesla 9](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-sl-tesla/9/)

[drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-tesla 11](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-sl-tesla/11/)



Build with failure documented in [drcsim issue #313](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issue/313/vrc_task_2_scoringtest-failure-with-nans): 

[drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-tesla 10](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-sl-tesla/10/)

Build with no seg-faults but a few test failures likely related to custom rosbag recording:

[drcsim_2.6-gazebo_1.8-nightly-arenas-log_segfault_alt gpu-sl-vrc 7](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim_2.6-gazebo_1.8-nightly-arenas-log_segfault_alt-heavy-precise-amd64-gpu-sl-vrc/7/)

Build with 2 failures:
[drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-amazon-vrc 5](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-amazon-vrc/5)

* [vrc_task_2_scoring](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-amazon-vrc/5/testReport/atlas_utils.TEST-vrc_task_2_scoring/Tester/atlas_utils_vrc_task_2_scoring_test_scoring/)
* `*** glibc detected *** gzserver: invalid fastbin entry (free): 0x00002aab1800d4f0 ***` during atlas_sandia_hands_publishers_hz_gpu.test
~~~
7: *** glibc detected *** gzserver: invalid fastbin entry (free): 0x00002aab1800d4f0 ***
7: ======= Backtrace: =========
7: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x7eb96)[0x2b86083c1b96]
7: /usr/lib/libgazebo_msgs.so.1(_ZN6gazebo4msgs4Pose10SharedDtorEv+0x34)[0x2b86069b8d94]
7: /usr/lib/libgazebo_msgs.so.1(_ZN6gazebo4msgs4PoseD1Ev+0x1b)[0x2b86069b8e1b]
7: /usr/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1(+0xeff93)[0x2b860a7acf93]
7: /usr/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1(_ZN6gazebo9rendering5Scene9OnPoseMsgERKN5boost10shared_ptrIKNS_4msgs12PosesStampedEEE+0x171)[0x2b860a7b1501]
7: /usr/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1(_ZN6gazebo9transport15CallbackHelperTINS_4msgs12PosesStampedEE13HandleMessageEN5boost10shared_ptrIN6google8protobuf7MessageEEE+0x49)[0x2b860a7ce7a9]
7: /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1(_ZN6gazebo9transport4Node15ProcessIncomingEv+0x3b9)[0x2b86060d1ec9]
7: /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1(_ZN6gazebo9transport12TopicManager12ProcessNodesEb+0x1bf)[0x2b86060dcccf]
7: /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1(_ZN6gazebo9transport17ConnectionManager9RunUpdateEv+0x163)[0x2b86060c6da3]
7: /usr/lib/libgazebo_transport.so.1(_ZN6gazebo9transport17ConnectionManager3RunEv+0x2c2)[0x2b86060c7fa2]
7: /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1(thread_proxy+0x69)[0x2b86077b5ce9]
7: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0(+0x7e9a)[0x2b8606c3be9a]
7: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(clone+0x6d)[0x2b8608436ccd]
~~~


Builds in progress:

[drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-amazon-vrc 6](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-amazon-vrc/6)

[drcsim_2.6-gazebo_1.8-nightly-arenas-log_segfault_alt gpu-sl-vrc 8](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim_2.6-gazebo_1.8-nightly-arenas-log_segfault_alt-heavy-precise-amd64-gpu-sl-vrc/8/)
description.html:
This is Ian's branch, but I'm creating the pull request to move discussion away from pull request #573.

This branch has been tested on Jenkins:

Builds with all tests passing:

drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-vrc 17

drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-tesla 8

drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-tesla 9

drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-tesla 11

Build with failure documented in drcsim issue #313:

drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-sl-tesla 10

Build with no seg-faults but a few test failures likely related to custom rosbag recording:

drcsim_2.6-gazebo_1.8-nightly-arenas-log_segfault_alt gpu-sl-vrc 7

Build with 2 failures: drcsim_2.6-gazebo-any gpu-amazon-vrc 5

  • vrc_task_2_scoring
  • *** glibc detected *** gzserver: invalid fastbin entry (free): 0x00002aab1800d4f0 *** during atlas_sandia_hands_publishers_hz_gpu.test
7: *** glibc detected *** gzserver: invalid fastbin entry (free): 0x00002aab1800d4f0 ***
